alert.note: Alert for Central Chelan County; Western Chelan County (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 26 at 3:58AM PST until December 26 at 12:00PM PST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON PST TODAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Snow accumulations up to 4 inches in the high terrain and ice accumulations around two tenths of an inch. * WHERE...Leavenworth, Stevens Pass, Holden Village, Plain, and Stehekin. * WHEN...Until Noon PST today. * IMPACTS...Plan on winter driving conditions during the Monday morning commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Central Chelan County; Western Chelan County
